message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for sale. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200.
I really like the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $170. This product is truly worth it!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product, which is the highest I can go.
